channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #以色列 "或多或少 "接受了停火协议：美国官员

item.title: #马克斯-维斯塔潘赢得赛季揭幕战巴林大奖赛冠军#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Max Verstappen wins season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/hM9DqALkve

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 据司法部门周六证实，一名男子因偷窃巴黎市政厅一名员工装有奥运安保计划的手提包而被判处七个月监禁。这起盗窃案发生在周一傍晚巴黎北站的一列火车上。
item.description:
A man has been jailed for seven months for stealing a bag containing Olympic security plans from an employee of the Paris town hall, a judicial source confirmed on Saturday. The theft occurred on Monday evening from a train at Paris' Gare du Nord station.https://t.co/Zf9jbQzYBd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 欧洲社会党周六在罗马启动了他们为 6 月欧洲议会选举而开展的竞选活动，重点是抵御极右翼势力抬头带来的 "过去的幽灵"：
item.description:
Europe's Socialists launched their campaign for June's European Parliament elections in Rome on Saturday with a focus on warding off "ghosts from the past" from an ascendant far right.
Full story: https://t.co/A9YLWmysY9 pic.twitter.com/1BexDNTAfz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 准军事部队于 12 月攻入苏丹的 Al-Jazira 州，由于通讯受阻，该州的信息十分匮乏。一名居民告诉法新社记者，达格洛的快速支援部队向数十人开枪，加剧了十个月战争中的暴行。
item.description:
A communications siege has made information scarce from Sudan's Al-Jazira state, which paramilitaries pushed into in December. A resident told AFP that Daglo's Rapid Support Forces shot at dozens of people, adding to the abuses over 10 months of war.https://t.co/aR1K8lFH8t

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 也门政府周六表示，一艘满载化肥的货轮在亚丁湾沉没，而这距离它被也门胡蒂叛军的导弹击毁还不到两周时间。胡蒂叛军声称 2 月 19 日对 Rubymar 号货轮发动了袭击。
item.description:
A cargo ship loaded with fertiliser has sunk in the Gulf of Aden, less than two weeks after it was damaged by missiles from Yemen's Huthi rebels, Yemen's government said Saturday. The Huthis claimed the February 19 attack against the Rubymar cargo ship.https://t.co/16DA69jfu6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 周六，在足球立法者为改善球员行为而做出的最新改革中，没有出现以蓝牌为特色的有争议的罪恶箱试验。但英超联赛经理们的负面反应推迟了试验细节。
item.description:
A controversial sin bin trial featuring blue cards was absent from the latest changes made by football's lawmakers to improve player behaviour on Saturday. But the negative response from Premier League managers delayed the trial details.https://t.co/4x6oUNhBod#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/4qFEHsj4tI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: #美国军用货机开始向加沙空投援助物资：官员
item.description:
#BREAKING US military cargo planes start dropping aid to Gaza: official pic.twitter.com/damQL7QhTR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: ⚽ 尤文图斯主教练阿莱格里周六表示，保罗-博格巴因违规服用兴奋剂而被禁赛意味着足球界失去了一位 "非凡 "的天才。博格巴因睾酮检测呈阳性，被意大利反兴奋剂法庭禁赛四年。
item.description:
⚽ Juventus coach Massimiliano Allegri said Saturday that Paul Pogba's ban for doping violations means football has lost an "extraordinary" talent. Pogba was banned for four years by Italy's anti-doping tribunal after testing positive for testosterone.https://t.co/s8EFw2JBno

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 本周，34 家数字机构向欧盟委员会投诉称，苹果公司对其在欧盟的服务所做的改变 "嘲弄 "了欧盟新的反垄断规则。其中包括应用程序制造商 Epic Games 和 Spotify.➡️。
item.description:
Changes Apple is making to its services in the European Union "make a mockery" of new antitrust rules in the bloc, 34 digital organisations complained to the European Commission this week. These include app makers Epic Games and Spotify.
➡️ https://t.co/FQeGQUZFNX pic.twitter.com/sVn1B1cPdA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 为巴黎奥运会冲浪项目建造的铝制裁判塔第一阶段工程本周在波利尼西亚完工，尽管工人们使用的一艘驳船破坏了现场的珊瑚，遭到了环保人士的反对。➡️。
item.description:
The first stage of construction of the aluminium judges' tower for the surfing event at the Paris Olympic Games was completed this week in Polynesia, despite opposition from environmentalists after a barge used by workers damaged coral at the site.
➡️ https://t.co/Z4IIRZFdVs pic.twitter.com/N8FarvpjmM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 周六，伊朗在议会和一个重要神职机构的投票后开始计票。据当地法尔斯通讯社估计，在 6100 万合格选民中，投票率 "超过 40%"，预计保守派将占主导地位：
item.description:
Iran began counting ballots on Saturday after a vote for parliament and a key clerical body. Local Fars news agency estimated turnout at "more than 40 percent", among 61 million eligible voters, and conservatives expected to dominate.
Read more: https://t.co/DvlF2nHJn9 pic.twitter.com/Y0E889lukA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 周六，卫冕冠军坎特伯雷十字军队以 37-24 的比分不敌新南威尔士华塔斯队，十年来首次在超级橄榄球赛季揭幕战中遭遇连败。
item.description:
🏉 Defending champions Canterbury Crusaders suffered back-to-back defeats to open a Super Rugby season for the first time in a decade, after slumping 37-24 against the NSW Waratahs Saturday.#AFPSportshttps://t.co/kYJcAopPyP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，一名西班牙游客与丈夫在东部恰尔肯德邦杜姆卡区骑摩托车旅行时遭到轮奸，之后三名男子于周六被捕。这对夫妇在杜姆卡区的帐篷里露营过夜。➡️。
item.description:
Three men were arrested Saturday, after the gang rape of a Spanish tourist on a motorbike trip with her husband in the Dumka district of the eastern state of Jharkhand, where the couple had stopped to camp the night in a tent, local media reports said.
➡️ https://t.co/nFTNW7e2om pic.twitter.com/veCyBRjBhy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 32 岁的瑞士滑雪运动员拉拉-古特-贝赫拉米（Lara Gut-Behrami）周六在克维特菲尔（Kvitfjell）赢得了本周末第一场女子 Super G 级比赛的冠军，从而在世界杯总积分榜上扩大了对受伤的美国明星米卡拉-希弗林（Mikaela Shiffrin）的领先优势：#AFPSports
item.description:
Swiss skier Lara Gut-Behrami, 32, on Saturday won the first women's Super G race of the weekend in Kvitfjell, to extend her lead in the overall World Cup standings on injured US star Mikaela Shiffrin.
Full story: https://t.co/P7MZuxZspd#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/JiMnealzi4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 周六，俄罗斯反对党领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的母亲在莫斯科南部的鲍里索沃公墓为他扫墓，此前的一天，成千上万的俄罗斯人冒着被捕的危险，在他的葬礼上向这位反腐运动人士致敬。
item.description:
The mother of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny visited his grave at the Borisovo cemetery in southern Moscow on Saturday, a day after thousands of Russians had risked arrest to pay tribute to the anti-corruption campaigner at his funeral.https://t.co/dSDFXTiLVm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 🏳️‍🌈 在一对同性恋情侣惨遭杀害事件考验了警察与 LGBTQ 群体之间的关系之后，悉尼通常沸沸扬扬的狂欢节游行将于本周六在阴郁的气氛中举行。组织者要求穿制服的警察不要参加游行。
item.description:
🏳️‍🌈Sydney's usually boisterous Mardi Gras parade will take place under a sombre shadow on Saturday, after the grisly killing of a gay couple tested relations between police and the LGBTQ community. Organisers have asked uniformed police not to participate.https://t.co/3EcBkUnSfy pic.twitter.com/vD2sCM0bvp

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 日本航天局表示，日本的月球着陆器在经历了为期两周的寒冷月夜后出人意料地重新进入休眠状态，并计划在本月晚些时候进行另一次操作尝试。完整报道
item.description:
Japan's Moon lander has been put back to sleep after it surprisingly survived the freezing, two-week lunar night, the country's space agency said, with another operation attempt scheduled for later this month.
Full story: https://t.co/nav1wGzhbL pic.twitter.com/hQqf6peLEL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 据当局周六报告，俄罗斯对乌克兰哈尔科夫州和敖德萨州的空袭一夜之间造成至少两人死亡。官员们还说，俄罗斯无人机的袭击损坏了多栋高层公寓楼，并造成数人受伤。➡️
item.description:
Overnight Russian aerial attacks on Ukraine's Kharkiv and Odesa regions killed at least two people, authorities reported on Saturday. Officials also said a Russian drone attack damaged multiple high-rise apartment buildings and injured several people.
➡️ https://t.co/WGDqfEZXzu pic.twitter.com/aakhVSRAAa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 🏀 波士顿凯尔特人队在杰森-塔图姆 32 分和 21 个三分球的助攻下，顶住了卢卡-东契奇 37 分的三双，在周五以 138-110 击败达拉斯小牛队，将 NBA 连胜场次推进到 10 场。
item.description:
🏀 The Boston Celtics, fueled by 32 points from Jayson Tatum and 21 three-pointers, withstood a 37-point triple-double from Luka Doncic to beat the Dallas Mavericks 138-110 on Friday and push their NBA winning streak to 10 games.#AFPSportshttps://t.co/xdyoLNC4HG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 世界贸易组织第 13 届部长级会议周六在阿布扎比闭幕，会议暂时延长了电子商务暂停期，但没有就农业和渔业问题达成任何协议，这使人们对这一多边贸易机构的有效性产生了怀疑。
item.description:
The World Trade Organization's 13th ministerial conference in Abu Dhabi ended Saturday with a temporary extension of an e-commerce moratorium but no deals on agriculture and fisheries, throwing into doubt the effectiveness of the multilateral trade body.https://t.co/9EYzdUTsqC pic.twitter.com/TeT5YIgUgq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在向议会发表的首次政策演讲中表示，无论议员们是否支持，他都将推动他的全面经济改革方案。
item.description:
Argentina's libertarian President Javier Milei, in his first policy speech to parliament, said he would push his package of sweeping economic reforms whether or not legislators back it. https://t.co/rltlApSfMg pic.twitter.com/gchECNrnUS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 周六，全球顶级名人将身着 "丛林热 "服装前往印度动物园，参加亚洲首富举办的派对。
item.description:
Top global celebrities will don "jungle fever" outfits in India for a trip to the zoo on Saturday as part of a party thrown by Asia's richest man. https://t.co/TUXmZuZVJm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 新科高山滑雪世界杯总冠军马可-奥德马特（Marco Odermatt）在周五的大回转比赛中连续第 11 次夺冠，赢得了本赛季该项目冠军 #AFPSports
item.description:
Newly crowned Alpine Skiing World Cup overall champion Marco Odermatt won his 11th straight giant slalom race on Friday to clinch this season's discipline title #AFPSports https://t.co/ShYaGlFjET pic.twitter.com/ht2l2SVPPa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 佛罗里达州一名联邦法官周五举行听证会，为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）被控不当处理机密文件的审判确定日期，并表示检察官提出的7月8日开庭的可能性不大。➡️。
item.description:
A federal judge in Florida held a hearing on Friday to set a date for Donald Trump's trial on charges of mishandling classified documents and said a July 8 start proposed by prosecutors was unlikely.
➡️https://t.co/Rkr22gjYbv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 周五，在罗马进行的意甲联赛中，AC 米兰以 1-0 战胜拉齐奥。
item.description:
Noah Okafor struck late to fire AC Milan to a 1-0 win at Lazio on Friday in a fiery Serie A match in Rome which finished with the outraged hosts down to eight men #AFPSports https://t.co/UesBceZp8j pic.twitter.com/HHnrTFxgJz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 电影《锈迹斑斑》的导演周五在法庭上说："在《锈迹斑斑》的拍摄现场，一名摄影师中枪身亡，感觉就像有人用棒球棍打我的肩膀一样。
item.description:
Getting shot on the set of "Rust" where a cinematographer was killed "felt like somebody had taken a baseball bat to my shoulder," the movie's director told a court Fridayhttps://t.co/xkXqMalIry pic.twitter.com/OOkh4XEnAN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 2, 2024

item.title: 周五，法甲领头羊巴黎圣日耳曼队客场 0-0 战平法国队长的前俱乐部摩纳哥队，姆巴佩在中场休息时被替换下场 #AFPSports
item.description:
Mbappe was substituted at half-time as Ligue 1 leaders Paris Saint-Germain drew 0-0 away to the France captain's former club Monaco on Friday #AFPSports https://t.co/v2UE7WE1y5 pic.twitter.com/ytAve7OIuc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对他在 2015 年帮助成立的人工智能公司 OpenAI 提起了诉讼，指责该公司的领导人 "背叛 "了公司的创始使命➡️。
item.description:
Elon Musk has launched a legal case against OpenAI, the AI firm he helped to set up in 2015, accusing its leaders of a "betrayal" of its founding mission
➡️https://t.co/gUqLU2BgcB pic.twitter.com/awbqzyyCKB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 1, 2024
